custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountAccountRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceDiscountAccountRel JOIN AccountEntry ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceAccountId = AccountEntry.accountEntryId JOIN CommerceDiscount ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId WHERE (CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId = ?) AND (LOWER(AccountEntry.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceDiscountAccountRel.* FROM CommerceDiscountAccountRel JOIN AccountEntry ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceAccountId = AccountEntry.accountEntryId JOIN CommerceDiscount ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId WHERE (CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId = ?) AND (LOWER(AccountEntry.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.CDiscountCAccountGroupRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CDiscountCAccountGroupRel JOIN CommerceDiscount ON CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId JOIN AccountGroup ON CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.commerceAccountGroupId = AccountGroup.accountGroupId WHERE (CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId = ?) AND (LOWER(AccountGroup.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceDiscount INNER JOIN CommerceDiscountRel ON CommerceDiscountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId WHERE (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceDiscount.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommerceDiscount LEFT JOIN CommerceDiscountAccountRel ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CDiscountCAccountGroupRel ON CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CommerceChannelRel ON (CommerceChannelRel.classPK = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) WHERE (CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId = ?) AND ( ( (CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) ) OR ( (CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelRelId IS NULL) ) OR ( (CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.cDiscountCAccountGroupRelId IN ([$ACCOUNT_GROUP_IDS$])) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) ) OR ( (CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.cDiscountCAccountGroupRelId IN ([$ACCOUNT_GROUP_IDS$])) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelRelId IS NULL) ) OR ( (CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceAccountId IS NULL) AND (CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.cDiscountCAccountGroupRelId IS NULL) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) ) OR ( (CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountAccountRelId IS NULL) AND (CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.cDiscountCAccountGroupRelId IS NULL) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelRelId IS NULL) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceDiscount.* FROM CommerceDiscount INNER JOIN CommerceDiscountRel ON CommerceDiscountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId WHERE (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceDiscount.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceDiscount.* FROM CommerceDiscount INNER JOIN CommerceDiscountRel ON CommerceDiscountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CommerceDiscountAccountRel ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CDiscountCAccountGroupRel ON CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CommerceChannelRel ON (CommerceChannelRel.classPK = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) WHERE (CommerceDiscount.companyId = ?) AND (CommerceDiscount.active_ = [$TRUE$]) AND (CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountAccountRelId IS NULL) AND (CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.cDiscountCAccountGroupRelId IS NULL) AND (CommerceChannelRel.commerceChannelRelId IS NULL) AND ( ( (CommerceDiscount.target = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classPK = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) ) OR ( (CommerceDiscount.target = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classPK IN ([$CLASS_PK_CATEGORIES$])) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) ) OR ( (CommerceDiscount.target = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classPK IN ([$CLASS_PK_PRICING_CLASSES$])) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT CommerceDiscount.* FROM CommerceDiscount LEFT JOIN CommerceDiscountAccountRel ON CommerceDiscountAccountRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CDiscountCAccountGroupRel ON CDiscountCAccountGroupRel.commerceDiscountId = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId LEFT JOIN CommerceChannelRel ON (CommerceChannelRel.classPK = CommerceDiscount.commerceDiscountId) AND (CommerceChannelRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommerceDiscountRel.classNameId = ?) AND (LOWER(AssetCategory.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
